snippet: The Transportation Security Administration says that 85 percent of the weapons seized by screeners in 2012 were loaded.
abstract: Transportation Security Administration says record-setting 1,500 firearms were detected by security screeners and seized in 2012, up from about 1,300 in 2011; says 85 percent of the weapons seized were loaded.
lead_paragraph: The Transportation Security Administration says that 85 percent of the weapons seized by screeners in 2012 were loaded.

headline.seo: T.S.A. Says Gun Confiscations on Rise at Airports
headline.main: Rise in Guns Confiscated at Airports
headline.print_headline: Rise in Guns Confiscated At Airports
